string.value: You must first go see Cassandra in order to collect an Aran Memory Fragment.
You must look for the wolves that are waiting for their masters.
When you approached the wolf, it jumped up and left an Aran Memory Fragment.

The Arans will need something on the day of their revival. Something to help them do their jobs in battles. Do you know what it is?

#b#L0#Hm... Is it some sort of a mount or something?#l
#k
Bingo! It's a Wolf. Have you seen any Wolves around that seem to be waiting for their masters?
Alright. Search for the Wolves that are waiting for their masters, the heroes who will revive when the seal is broken. Surely, you'll find an Aran Memory Fragment then.
You must find the Wolves before you can find the Aran Memory Fragment.
I heard someone say he saw it in Lith Harbor...
